tool_description: Provides HVAC system control recommendations based on air quality analysis to optimize indoor environment conditions.

hvac_capabilities.description: Available HVAC functions: heating, cooling, ventilation, humidification, dehumidification, filtration

error_messages: Invalid temperature values: Temperatures must be reasonable for indoor environments (-10 to 50Â°C).

usage: Provide current_temperature, current_humidity, and air_quality_score. Optionally specify targets, energy_efficiency_mode, outdoor_temperature, occupancy_level, and hvac_capabilities.

temperature_action.description: Temperature control recommendation: increase, decrease, maintain

humidity_action.description: Humidity control recommendation: humidify, dehumidify, maintain

filtration_level.description: Air filtration intensity: low, medium, high

estimated_energy_impact.description: Expected energy usage impact: low, medium, high
